tests.title: Mock Test 1
tests.description: Comprehensive aptitude test covering quantitative and logical reasoning
instructions: The test consists of 31 questions to be completed in 120 minutes.
For each question, you need to type your answer in the provided text field. Make sure to format your answer correctly.
You can use the navigation panel to jump to any question. Unattempted questions will be marked in gray, attempted in green.
You can mark questions for review and come back to them later.
The test will automatically submit when the time is up. You can also submit manually before time expires.

importantNotes.text: Make sure your answers don't have any extra spaces before or after the text. Answers with leading or trailing spaces may be marked as incorrect.
The test must be taken in full-screen mode. The test will automatically end if you exit full-screen mode for more than 45 seconds. Right-clicking and copy-pasting are disabled during the test.

components.name: Quantitative Aptitude
components.description: Probability & statistics, permutation & combination, arithmetic progressions, geometry, algebra

components.name: Logical Reasoning
components.description: Direction sense, coding-decoding, clocks & calendars, blood relations, series completion

tests.agreementText: I have read and understood the instructions. You must agree to start the test. Once started, the timer cannot be paused.

tests.title: Mock Test 2 - Advanced
tests.description: Advanced level test with higher difficulty questions
instructions: The test consists of 45 questions to be completed in 180 minutes.
This is an advanced level test with complex problem-solving questions.
Each question carries different weightage based on difficulty level.
Negative marking applies: -0.25 marks for each incorrect answer.
You can use the navigation panel to jump to any question. Color coding: Gray (unattempted), Green (attempted), Red (marked for review).

importantNotes.text: Negative marking is applicable. Think carefully before answering as incorrect answers will deduct marks.
Calculator usage is not permitted. The test must be taken in full-screen mode without any external assistance.

components.name: Advanced Mathematics
components.description: Calculus, linear algebra, differential equations, complex analysis

components.name: Analytical Reasoning
components.description: Critical thinking, pattern recognition, data interpretation, logical puzzles

tests.agreementText: I understand this is an advanced test with negative marking. I agree to attempt the test under the specified conditions.

tests.title: Quick Assessment
tests.description: Short assessment test for basic skill evaluation
instructions: The test consists of 20 questions to be completed in 60 minutes.
This is a basic skill assessment covering fundamental concepts.
All questions are mandatory and carry equal weightage.
No negative marking for incorrect answers.
Submit immediately after completing all questions.

importantNotes.text: This is a practice test. Your performance will be used for skill assessment and personalized recommendations.

components.name: Logical Thinking
components.description: Basic reasoning, pattern identification, simple logical problems

tests.agreementText: I agree to take this assessment test. I understand this is for evaluation purposes.
